comment_semi

Spoken Definition
remark, comment Executes insertAtEOL with arguments [// ]
big remark, big comment, multiline remark, multiline comment Inserts /* $_ */
doc remark, dock remark, documentation remark Inserts /**$n * $_$n*/$_
